title: Did Mike Bloomberg say: " Anyone who can be a farmer, that technical work requires "more gray matter '?
subtitle: The Republican Governor of South Dakota accused presidential candidate 2020 of "wretched ignorance" of his remarks in 2016.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In 2016, Mike Bloomberg said that "he can teach anyone to be a farmer," but information technology required "a lot of gray matter."
